resources.string: I\'m sorry, speech is not supported.
Hi, I\'m Mapbox\'s assistant! How can I help you?
That layer isn\'t in this map style! Try changing a different layer.
This method isn\'t set up yet. Try a different PropertyFactory method!
Sorry, please try repeating the command. Also, the method you said might not exist!
Sorry, please try repeating the command. The number you said was unclear.
Sorry, please try repeating the command. The layer you said might not exist in this style.
Sorry, could not find that location. Please try again or choose a different place.
